name: Rumeru's Evil Deeds
description:
Rumeru's Evil Deeds

Rumeru wants to be chief instead of the chief, and set up a plan to assassinate them. Over a few days, he's going to slip poison into their tea, which will slowly kill them. The death will look natural, and nobody will be able to point a finger at him.

Made over a weekend for MiniJam 129, which theme was "poison" and limitation was "You are not the hero".

Only two days are playable right now, I didn't have time to implement more content.  I enjoyed working on this game, so I might get back to it.

Everything was made by me, Gatlink, with the exception of the font which was made by Mathieu Triay.
